Class AwtCanvasAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.bridge.swing.AwtCanvasAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.arbergashi.charts.core.rendering.ArberCanvas
public final class AwtCanvasAdapter extends Object implements com.arbergashi.charts.core.rendering.ArberCanvas
Graphics2D-backed ArberCanvas implementation (Swing/legacy bridge).
